lead_paragraph: For the second time in a week, the Yankees jettisoned a top-flight reliever, exchanging Miller for four minor leaguers, including Cleveland’s top-rated prospect.

headline.print_headline: Turning Toward the Future, the Yankees Trade Miller to the Indians
headline.main: Yankees Trade Andrew Miller to the Indians

snippet: For the second time in a week, the Yankees jettisoned a top-flight reliever, exchanging Miller for four minor leaguers, including Cleveland’s top-rated prospect....
abstract: New York Yankees, whose offense has been struggling to score lately, surprise many by trading away star pitcher Andrew Miller for four prospects.
